metadata.title: CVE-2011-0343

platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 12
SUSE Linux Enterprise Module for Legacy 12
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP3
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP4
SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for SAP Applications 12 SP5

metadata.description: Balabit syslog-ng 2.0, 3.0, 3.1, 3.2 OSE and PE, when running on FreeBSD or HP-UX, does not properly perform cast operations, which causes syslog-ng to use a default value of -1 to create log files with insecure permissions (07777), which allows local users to read and write to these log files.

criterions.comment: SUSE Linux Enterprise High Performance Computing 12 is installed

SUSE Linux Enterprise Server 12 is installed
